ygData.subject: Re: What makes a good scenario
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I ll try to point things in a certain direction. Tevildo, could you update the documentation in your scenarios to include a list of the scenarios with

Well, I'll try to point things in a certain direction.

Tevildo, could you update the documentation in your scenarios to 
include a list of the scenarios with the #s, as well as a brief 
description of each one?

Part of scenario being good, IMHO, is that plays well with both LARGE 
and SMALL teams.  I would hate to go through the 'Stairs' or the 
'Labryinth' in the tevfifty with more than 4 members on my team.  But, 
to be fair, my 'Slime Lords' was redesigned to have multiple 
entrances, but is somewhat cramped on the inside.

I'll leave some more of my thoughts for tomorrow.  Meanwhile, this 
oughta be an easy question for everybody to respond to.
